brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts the affect of Q o S on three types of communications traffic:

Streaming video or audio:
Without Q o S - Choppy picture that starts and stops.
With Q o S - Clear continuous service.

Vital transactions:
Without Q o S - Transaction may be at a higher price
With Q o S - Transaction may be at a lower price

Downloading web pages (often lower priority)
Without Q o S - Web pages may arrive a little bit later
With Q o S - The end result is identical
